
 * 
 * THIS file should contain
 * custom codes not found in this project
 * 
 * GUIDELINES
 * 1. functions and 'global' variables should start with sch_ e.g sch_translate().  global variables are variable that can be called anywhere --e.g variables NOT used in functions
 * 2. do not use hardcoded strings, pls write in respective 
 * language file in folder "strings"
 * 3. do not edit any code found in the folder "defaults" please
 * 	-to edit lang in "default" use array in strings, with the same 
 * shortcode
 ***** PLEASE READ localization/liesmich readme.txt for more info
